Author: Good-Gold-6515

Comment: I worked as a contractor at Chevron for many years. The office moving staff was primarily made up of undocumented immigrants. It was sort of an open secret and no one said shit because no one wanted these guys to lose their jobs. They were all super cool, nice, and great workers.  How this group worked is that they would load 3-4 guys up on the same SS# that was legit. So one dude who had a SS# would get friends/relatives a job and they'd all use the same SS#.  I always assumed the contractor company just made it look on payroll like they were paying 1 guy $60/hr while in reality they were paying 4 guys $15/hr.
